          <title>
            <string language="en">Chemical detection: aluminium chloride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemische Abfragung: 
Aluminiumchlorverbindung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détection chimique : chlorure d'aluminium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deteção química: cloreto de alumínio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rilevazione chimica: cloruro di alluminio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημική ανίχνευση: χλωρίδιο αλουμινίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Detección química: cloruro de aluminio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third of four illustrations demonstrating a sequence of tests performed to identify what compounds are present in four test solutions. This shows that the solution being tested contains aluminium chloride.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">aluminium chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Bunsen flame</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flame test</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">ions</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Metals</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">silver nitrate</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solids</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third von vier Abbildungen, die eine Reihenfolge 
der Tests zeigen, führte durch, um zu kennzeichnen, welche Mittel in 
vier Testlösungen anwesend sind. Dieses zeigt, daß die 
Lösung, die geprüft wird, Aluminiumchlorverbindung enthält.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le tiers de quatre illustrations démontrant un 
ordre des essais a exécuté pour identifier quels composés sont 
présents dans quatre solutions d'essai. Ceci prouve que la 
solution étant testée contient le chlorure d'aluminium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O third de quatro ilustrações que demonstram uma
seqüência dos testes executou para identificar que compostos estão 
atuais em quatro soluções do teste. Isto mostra que a 
solução que está sendo testada contem o cloreto de alumínio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un terzo di quattro illustrazioni che dimostrano 
una sequenza delle prove ha effettuato per identificare che residui 
sono presenti in quattro soluzioni della prova. Ciò indica che 
la soluzione che è esaminata contiene il cloruro di alluminio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που καταδεικνύουν μια 
ακολουθία δοκιμών που εκτελούνται για να προσδιορίσουν ποιες 
ενώσεις είναι παρούσες σε τέσσερις λύσεις δοκιμής. Αυτό 
δείχνει ότι η λύση που εξετάζεται περιέχει το χλωρίδιο 
αλουμινίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El tercero de cuatro ilustraciones que 
demostraban una secuencia de pruebas se realizó para identificar qué
compuestos están presentes en cuatro soluciones de la prueba. 
Esto muestra que la solución que es probada contiene el cloruro
de aluminio.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
